source_title: Cold applications have a <2% response rate now + the warm path system that replaces them (includes a guide and prompts!)

insights.insight: Relationship half-life, the reciprocity ledger, vouch scores, resurrection opportunities, network archetypes, and dynamic warm path discovery—each mapped to a concrete job-search action.Cowork vs. Cha
insights.action: Use this approach in your work

insights.insight: Not the questions the platform wants you to ask, not the questions that optimize for their engagement metrics or premium tier conversions, but your questions—the ones they’d never build a button for
